scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with short brown hair and glasses stands on a stage in front of a large red TEDx logo. he is wearing a gray t-shirt and jeans. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with short brown hair and glasses is standing on a stage in front of a large red TED sign. he is wearing a black t-shirt and jeans. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: two men standing next to a jeep on a dirt road
scenes.recaption: two men standing next to a black suburban on a rocky dirt road. the men are wearing casual clothes and the suburban has a brush guard on the front. there are trees and rocks in the background.

scenes.caption: two men standing next to a truck on a dirt road
scenes.recaption: two men in tactical gear standing next to a black suburban on a rocky road. the men are wearing hats and sunglasses. the suburban has a brush guard and a roof rack.

scenes.caption: a television screen showing a soccer game
scenes.recaption: A soccer match is taking place. The score is 1-0. The game is being played on a grass field. The stadium is filled with people.
